body: Gonzalo A. Luengo O. compiled a long list of tweets [es] from February 27, 2010, when an 8.8-magnitude earthquake hit Chile at 3:34 a.m. local time.

title: Chile: Remembering 8.8-magnitude earthquake with tweets from Feb. 27, 2010
